maqras.text: Ni forbade him el akcept all nursing mothers (His sister) tiam dir mi montr vi famili raise him vi sorb bon zorg de him
Tiel ni restored him his mother en ord placx her remove her worries let her kon ti di promes est truth! Tamen plej de them ne kon
When li reached maturity strength ni dot him kun wisdom knowledge! Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous

Once li entered urb unexpectedly sen recognized popol! Li trov 2 hom batal unu est (Hebre) el his popol ali est (Egipt) his enemies. 1 el his popol vok sur him por help his enemy Moses punched him killing him! Li dir This est work diabl; li est efektiv enemy profound misleader
Li dir My Lord mi wronged my anim. Placx forgive me Li forgave him! Li est Forgiver Merciful
Li dir My Lord dors por Your blessings me mi neniam est supporter kulp unu
En des maten li est urb afraid watchful. Unu streb his help hieraux pet his help re. Moses dir al him Vi est really trouble maker
Antaux li prov strik their komun enemy li dir O Moses vi want do kill me as vi killed ali hom hieraux? Obviously vi wish est tiran ter; vi ne wish est righteous
Hom ven kur ali flank de urb dir, O Moses popol est plotting kill vi! Vi bon las tuj! Mi don vi bon advice
Li fled urb afraid watchful. Li dir My Lord sav me el oppressive popol
As li vojagx Midyan li dir maj my Lord direkt me dekstr path
When li reached Midyan's akv li trov crowd popol akv rimark 2 women waiting sur des flank. Li dir Ki est gxi ke vi bezon? Ili dir Ni ne est able al akv crowd disperses our patr est old hom
Li akv them tiam torn shade dir My Lord whatever provision vi send al me mi est en dire bezon por gxi
Baldaux 1 de 2 women approached him shyly dir My patr invit vi pag vi akv us. When li met him told him his fabel li dir ne Hav tim! Vi sav oppressive popol
de 2 women dir O my patr lu him! Li est bon unu lu li est fort honest

Li dir Mi wish ofert 1 de my 2 daughters vi al marry dors working me 8 pilgrimages se vi far them 10 gxi est voluntary your part! Mi ne wish far this materi tro difficult por vi. Vi trov me DI testament righteous
Li dir Gxi est agreement me vi. Whichever period mi fulfill vi ne est averse al either 1. DI est guarantor DE ki NI DIR
